text: A Petersburg Night () is a 1934 Soviet drama movie directed by Grigori Roshal and Vera Stroyeva.ПЕТЕРБУРГСКАЯ НОЧЬ It stars Lyubov Orlova, Boris Dobronravov, and Kseniya Tarasova. == Actors == * Lyubov Orlova as Grushenka * Boris Dobronravov as Musician Egor Efimov * Kseniya Tarasova as Nastenka * Anatoliy Goryunov as Schults * Lev Fenin as Landlord * Igor Doronin as Student == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:1934 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Grigori Roshal Category:Movies directed by Vera Stroyeva
title: A Petersburg Night
